subject: Return of goods
description_text:
To whom it may concern.

I am requesting details for how to return the items that I recently
purchased.
My apologies, however it was bought as a present that is no longer needed.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
I look forward to hearing from you and thankyou for your time.

Yours sincerely
Dave Pears.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dave Pears,    May I have your order number, please?

I believe this to be the order number.
#SSN4208

Name.  jenna vigo

Hi Dave Pears,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your three packages have been deliveredâ€”did you receive them?  Only the new shifter hasn't shipped yet. Would you like to cancel it?

Good morning.

That's correct, I have three panels to return and the gearstick to cancel
please.

Thank you for your time.

Dave.
Hi Dave Pears,    We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. For products that have already been shipped, we are unable to cancel your order.

Good morning
How do I sort  out returns for the items that are here.

Thanks

Good morning.

I was under the impression before ordering that if I wished to return them
within twenty-eight days then a return label would be issued for me to
print and return to you.

Thanks
Dave
